title: Eishashitsu no Wakaba-san
sinopse:
New Eigeki is a revival house theater that was built in 1961. Wakaba, a very calm and aloof projectionist, was working there. Wakaba, who silently inserts film into the projector inside of the cramped and sweltering projection booth, has a large, secret fan base?

(Source: Mag Garden, translated)
